comment: Great fun and I managed to win!
A bit slow but I eventually got the hang of it
Very engaging, and a lot of skill to crafting the best clues!
Enjoyed a lot but it was a bit shallow as how good you are seemed to boil down to whether you could recognise obscure references
turned out to be professor plum!
I swear some of the cards dont have the same picture on at all!
Great game - love the 3d design of the board and pieces and also the different characters you can get.
